name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Manhattan Missions
name_original: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Manhattan Missions
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Manhattan Missions is an arcade game developed by Distinctive Software. It came out on 01-01-1991. Konami published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Manhattan Missions is available on PC.
